description:
Isaac is 19 and lives in one of those hot, hot cities in the southwest.
"It's too hot," he said. "I'm ready to move. Maybe to some place cold like Seattle."
Isaac is gay and came out when he was 17.
"I'm a bottom," he answered when asked.
"Have you ever topped before?"
"I have," he replied.
"But you just prefer bottoming?"
"Yeah," he said. "The orgasm is just so much better!"
He had a boyfriend when we shot this video, but they broke up shortly thereafter. I don't know if the break up had anything to do with the video. Isaac didn't want to say.
Issac likes to go clubbing and he generally meets other guys there or on the Internet.
Oh, and he loves big dicks!
title: Isaac
